aspects.description: All 4 required pages are implemented
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that index.html (Home), courses.html, mentors.html, and about.html files exist in the /src directory

aspects.description: Home page is accessible at index.html
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Navigate to index.html directly and verify it loads the Home page content

aspects.description: CSS files are properly organized in css/ directory
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that main CSS file exists in /src/css/ directory and is properly linked in HTML files

aspects.description: Assets are organized in appropriate directories
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Verify images are in /src/assets/images/ or similar organized structure, not scattered in root

aspects.description: No server-side or client-side frameworks used
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check HTML files and dependencies - only HTML5 and CSS3 should be used, no React, Vue, Bootstrap, etc.

aspects.description: Header contains SkillShare Academy logo
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that header includes SkillShare Academy logo (text or image) on the left side, preferably the vertical purple logo

aspects.description: Navigation links to all 4 main pages
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Click each navigation link (Home, Courses, Mentors, About) and verify they navigate to correct pages

aspects.description: Header and navigation are consistent across all pages
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Visit all 4 pages and verify header/navigation look identical (except active page highlighting is allowed)

aspects.description: Mobile hamburger menu implemented (CSS-only)
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Resize browser to mobile width (360px) and verify hamburger menu appears and functions without JavaScript

aspects.description: Footer includes copyright notice
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that footer contains copyright notice with current year or appropriate text

aspects.description: Footer has four-column layout structure (desktop)
aspects.extraDescription: Test: On desktop view (1920px), verify footer displays in four-column layout with company info, Learn, Support, and Company sections

aspects.description: Social media icons are present and properly styled
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check that footer includes social media icons for Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram (can be placeholder links)

aspects.description: Footer is consistent across all pages
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Visit all 4 pages and verify footer content and styling are identical

aspects.description: Hero section with two-column layout and call-to-action buttons
aspects.extraDescription: Test: On desktop view, verify hero section displays text content on left, image on right, with two call-to-action buttons below text

aspects.description: All required Home page sections are present
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check for platform benefits (6 cards), community impact statistics, featured courses with credit badges, and testimonials sections

aspects.description: All required Courses page sections are present
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check for hero section with credit explanation, course filters (categories + search), and complete course cards with all elements (image, title, instructor, rating, credit badge, 'FREE' price, button)

aspects.description: All required Mentors page sections are present
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check for mentor filters (search + dropdowns), featured mentors section with special badges, and mentor cards with credit rate badges showing diamond icon and variable rates (8-15 credits per hour)

aspects.description: All required About page sections are present
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check for mission/vision section (two-column layout), community leaders with team profiles, community story with timeline, and contact section with form and information

aspects.description: SkillShare Academy color scheme and branding
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Check for consistent use of purple-orange-cyan color palette and proper gradient styling on credit badges (cyan-to-green for earning, purple-to-orange for rates)

aspects.description: Overall visual design quality and creativity
judgementScoreDescription: Design lacks creativity and visual appeal, poor use of color scheme and layout
Design has basic visual appeal but limited creativity in layout and color usage
Design is visually appealing with good use of color scheme and creative layout elements
Excellent creative design with outstanding visual appeal, masterful use of color scheme, and innovative layout that effectively communicates the SkillShare Academy brand

aspects.description: Mobile responsiveness (360Ã—640)
judgementScoreDescription: Website is completely broken on mobile viewport, content overflows or is unreadable
Basic mobile layout works but has significant issues with spacing, readability, or functionality
Good mobile responsive design with proper layout adaptation, readable text, and usable navigation
Excellent mobile experience with optimized layouts, perfect readability, and thoughtful mobile-specific design choices

aspects.description: Tablet responsiveness (768Ã—1024)
judgementScoreDescription: Website layout is broken or poorly adapted for tablet viewport
Basic tablet layout works but lacks optimization for the medium screen size
Good tablet responsive design with appropriate column adjustments and spacing
Excellent tablet experience with optimized layouts that make effective use of the medium screen real estate

aspects.description: Desktop responsiveness and layout quality (1920Ã—1080)
judgementScoreDescription: Desktop layout is poorly implemented with bad spacing or broken elements
Basic desktop layout works but lacks polish in spacing and visual hierarchy
Good desktop layout with proper use of space, clear visual hierarchy, and effective multi-column layouts
Excellent desktop experience with outstanding use of large screen space, perfect visual hierarchy, and sophisticated layout techniques

aspects.description: Smooth responsive behavior between breakpoints
aspects.extraDescription: Test: Resize browser window gradually from 360px to 1920px width and verify no horizontal scrolling, content remains readable, and layout transitions smoothly

aspects.description: CSS code organization and maintainability
judgementScoreDescription: CSS code is unorganized with poor structure and no meaningful class names
CSS code has basic organization but lacks consistent naming conventions
CSS code is well-organized with good structure and meaningful class names
CSS code is excellently organized with modular structure, meaningful class names, and efficient use of modern CSS features

aspects.description: W3C validation compliance (HTML and CSS)
judgementScoreDescription: W3C validators report more than 5 errors per page for HTML or CSS
W3C validators report 3-5 errors per page for HTML or CSS
W3C validators report 1-2 errors per page for HTML or CSS
W3C validators report no HTML or CSS errors on all implemented pages

aspects.description: SEO and accessibility implementation
judgementScoreDescription: Poor implementation with missing title tags, meta descriptions, alt text, and no accessibility features
Basic implementation with some title tags and alt text but inconsistent across pages
Good implementation with proper semantic HTML, title tags, meta descriptions, and basic accessibility features
Excellent implementation with comprehensive SEO (titles, meta, headings) and WCAG AA accessibility standards (alt text, focus states, contrast)

aspects.description: Cross-browser compatibility
judgementScoreDescription: Website is completely broken in either Chrome or Firefox
Major visual or functional differences between Chrome and Firefox
Minor differences between browsers but mostly consistent appearance
Website looks and functions identically in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
